item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 4, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

6. Thunder Compute (YC S24) is hiring a GPU systems engineer ( | hide)

10. Why do we need modules at all? (2011) (95 points | 51 comments)

23. Show HN: The C3 programming language (C alternative language) (150 points | 110 comments)
24. Microsoft employees recall their early years (143 points | 112 comments)

26. The slow collapse of critical thinking in OSINT due to AI (379 points | 201 comments)
27. Senior Developer Skills in the AI Age (363 points | 268 comments)

30. What is Local first development (103 points | 44 comments)
